title: Fix localhost board favicon
description: The favicon shown for the localhost tickboard server is incorrect. Update to use the correct ticks favicon.
notes: 2026-01-24 17:59 - Work on this task was interrupted by user. May be partially complete.
closed_reason: Copied correct favicon files (PNG and ICO) from logos/favicon/ to internal/tickboard/server/static/. The server was using outdated PNG/ICO files that differed from the canonical versions. Now all favicon formats match the official ticks branding.
